data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Xing-Min, Ge, Feng, Ren, Shun-Xiang (2012): The genus Shirozuella Sasaji (Coleoptera, Coccinellidae, Shirozuellini) from the Chinese mainland. ZooKeys 182: 87-108, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.182.2430, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.182.2430
